definition: gall bladder/courage/guts/gall/inner container (e.g. bladder of a football, inner container of a thermos)
alcohol/wine with high alcohol content/rich/pure/good wine/sterols

sentences.english: "I would suggest they got a cholesterol test with these symptoms, " says Smith.
sentences.chinese: 有这此症状的人，我会建议他们去检查一下胆固醇。

sentences.english: They lower cholesterol and are recommended for prevention against atherosclerosis.
sentences.chinese: 低胆固醇含量有助于阻止动脉硬化。

sentences.english: Tofu is as good as medicine for lowing cholesterol
sentences.chinese: 豆腐是一种类似低胆固醇的良药。

sentences.english: This is good for reducing cholesterol.
sentences.chinese: 好莲沱茶有助降低胆固醇。

sentences.english: Find out if your overweight is leading to high  cholesterol, as it is known to do.
sentences.chinese: 发现你的超重是否如所知的那样，已导致胆固醇偏高。

sentences.english: A possible relationship exists between human aggressive behaviour and low serum cholesterol lev-el.
sentences.chinese: 人的攻击行为与血清胆固醇浓度偏低可能有关。

sentences.english: The open, needle-like aces in the atheromatous plaque are cholesterol clefts.
sentences.chinese: 在粥样斑块中看到的针状空隙即为胆固醇结晶。

sentences.english: Plant stanols can safely be used with cholesterol lowering medication.
sentences.chinese: 植物甾醇可用来作为安全降低胆固醇的药物。

sentences.english: These foods are naturally fat- and cholesterol-free, as well as low in sodium.
sentences.chinese: 这些食品是不含脂肪和胆固醇的，钠盐含量也很低。

sentences.english: In fact, my cholesterol numbers could win me awards.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，我的胆固醇高的可以让我拿奖。

sentences.english: The serum cholesterols of the force-fed rats only were positively increased most probably from exogenous sources.
sentences.chinese: 塡食鼠血清内胆固醇增加，可能源于食物。

sentences.english: So why would you want to lower your cholesterol?
sentences.chinese: 那么为什么你想降低你的胆固醇呢？

sentences.english: The LDL cholesterol is the so-called bad cholesterol.
sentences.chinese: 这个底密度脂蛋白就是所谓的不好的胆固醇。

sentences.english: Cholesterol is the principal sterol and it is an essential component of animal cell membranes.
sentences.chinese: 胆固醇是哺乳动物体内最重要的一类甾醇小分子。

sentences.english: Lowering cholesterol levels markedly reduces the incidence of fatal heart attacks.
sentences.chinese: 低胆固醇含量的人其致命的心脏病发生率明显降低。

pinyin: bu4 bao3 he2 zhi1 fang2 suan1
dong4 mai4 zhou1 yang4 ying4 hua4

definition: fat (in the body, in a plant, or in food)
